description: This file defines a React component called ProtectedRoute, which is used to implement role-based access control (RBAC) in a React application. It conditionally renders its children or redirects/notifies users based on authentication status, roles, and permissions.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, requiredRoles, requiredPermission })
methods.description: React functional component that enforces access control based on user authentication, roles, and permissions.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ children, requiredRoles, requiredPermission }) {$/
